description: Great GUI, but incessant problems (could not find xref at specified location), updates help for a while then problem reappears
Great simple program for editing pdf-s.
I think it's a great app.
Great simple app that does the job.
Really good... invaluable tool. Faster that Adobe acrobat
summary: Brilliant little tool for combining/splitting pdf's

description: I tried to change the order of one page in a small pdf file and when saving it got an error message: "Unable to find endstream marker ...".
summary: Does not work on a simplest case

description:
Pdfarranger is actively maintained and we try to make it as smooth as possible but unfortunately we can't find all the bugs ourselves. It is always a bad experience if you want to get something done and the software doesn't work like it should. The good news is that you can improve the situation for the next time you or someone else uses pdfarranger by reporting the issue to the developers, thank you 

Raise an issue at Github: https://github.com/jeromerobert/pdfarranger/issues/new
Or file a bug in bugzilla: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/enter_bug.cgi?product=Fedora&component=pdfarranger
Or send me an email: dreua@fedoraproject.org
summary: Please help us make pdfarranger better

description: Have not been able to open it. PDF Mod at least opens!. (Cannot submit with one star?!?!)
Simple and Great App
The program is very intuitive and easy to use and just does what it promises.
It never left to open a pdf from the menu or opening the pdf with the app.
Very useful application.
It does exactly what it says it does and never had a problem with it. Very easy to use and manipulate the PDF files.

Unlike other PDF manipulators, this one does what it says it does, and works right out of the box. Formerly known as PDFShuffler? I was pretty bummed out when I couldn't find PDFShuffler in the software centre, but pretty happy when I noticed that PDF Arranger has the same logo. I've used this software many times in the past and the only complaint I've ever had with it is how slow it was when you were adding many hundred pages, but I still used it because it worked great. The current version is just as useful, but has the advantage of being many times faster. Keep up the good work.
We do more of this pdf software
I too was a fan of PDF-shuffler, which this seems to be a cousin or clone of. Does exactly what it says, no more, no less. Intuitive user interface, much like handling actual sheets of paper.
Just what I wanted

- Easy to use
- Lightweight
Hangs while exporting selection from a pdf doc
Simple and gets the job done

I wanted to rotate some contents in my PDF file. This app did not help. I thought I could crop, then rotate the stuff I had cropped, but no. Cropping only hides the stuff you cropped, you can't do anything else with it.
summary: Not that intuitive. Does what it says it does, but nothing more

description: It's a shame it's proprietary software, because this is a lovely, straightforward app. I've trained my learners to use pdf scanners to sumbmit their homework, instead of photos, but many of them haven't got the hang of combining all the pages into a single document. This makes it the work of a minute, rather than ten minutes with Libre Office, to merge multiple pages into a useable document.
It's a very nice alternative of online pdf tools with an easy-to-use interface. I would totally recommend it!
Exelente herramienta
I use it to split pdf documents for my students. I just have to select the pages I want, right click them and choose "export selection". Really simple and intuitive
"Page split" function saved me from doing much more work!
summary: Worked great for exactly what I wanted!

description: This is the only functional pdf suite I was able to find. Just works.
summary: Excellent -- the unique functional snap pdf suite

description: It solves the problem that it proposes to solve. Good job!
Added and deleted pages. No sweat.
非常實用，而且也沒有試過出現Bug
Fast and intuitive design

All text and formatting appears to be preserved. Text is still selectable and searchable in the exported, rearranged pdf. Very easy to drag and drop pages to a new position and to delete pages. Another great feature is the ability to highlight only the pages you want to work with. Selecting/deselecting multiple pages is intuitive just as you would select/deselect multiple files using shift or ctrl keys.

Either this is very limited or I don't understand it! It seems that to split a file into individual pages, you have to perform an export operation for every single page. If I'm not understanding, I think it's because the interface is poor, because I'm not a beginner.
summary: Either very limited or poor interface

description: PDF Mix Tool was lacks the feature to view pages as I rearrange them. This tool seems to address that. If you are looking for PDF annotation tool then I would suggest using Xchange Viewer with Wine.
summary: Best PDF tool I could find

description: simple and efficient
summary: great to delete pages from a big PDF

description:
I just needed to cut some pages from a PDF file. Then save a new PDF file containing a lesser number of pages.

At Save it reported: 

"The metadata field / Trapped with value '/False' has no XMP equivalent, so it was discarded"

IT DID SAVE THE FILE EXACTLY AS I WANTED IT TO BE !!

So one happy camper.

The save page would not then easily close.

Useful :-)
summary: WORKS, but reports an issue at file SAVE time

description: Needed to put a signature in a long boiler plate pdf. With PDF Arranger I was able to drag and drop a pdf with my signature directly replacing the unsigned page and then save. So easy!
summary: worked first time! Loved the drag and drop functionality

description:
Love it 
You cannot find a better program I think.
summary: Perfect for my needs. Simple. Easy to use

description: I was looking for this app for so much time. Don't look in Internet for merge pdf, this app works and for free!
Very easy to use, and just what I needed to combine a number of pdfs into one. Thanks!
Simple and best offline application to work with PDF.

It does exactly what it promises. I have been using it for years now. It was formerly called "PDF Shuffler" but this was just a change in naming. It has so far never disappointed me and keeps reliably doing what it should do. It allows me to add or remove PDF pages and to re-arrange the order of pages. And all that in a very intuitive and rather simple way. It is a perfect little tool.
summary: Does only very little but that perfectly

description: Freh installed together with Kubuntu 19-10. Unfortunaltely it show me not the pages only the pdf name and page numbers.
Eignet sich perfekt, um z. B. eine DIN-A5-Seite zweimal auf A4 zu drucken oder so. Druckfunktion wäre nett.
summary: Super zum kurzen Hin- und herschieben

description: Es war sehr einfach, die einzelnen Seiten zu drehen.
Ideal geeignet zum Sortieren und auch Zusammenführen unterschielicher PDF-Dateien. Drehen geht auch gut. Alles ist sehr übersichtlich.
summary: Super hilfreiches Programm beim arbeiten mit PDF-Dateien

description: Echt tolles Programm
Bei extrem großen PDF (95MB) arbeitet die CPU ewig bei 100% und wird nie fertig.

I use it for a few years now and find, it's a great program.
It does what is promissed.

Works with Ubuntu 19.04 LTS up to 20.04 LTS and
Kubuntu 20.04 LTS.
Very much recommended. Special thanks to the programmer!
A support donation will follow soon, which is long overdue.
Super Programm. Ich habe damit schnell mal in ein mehrseitiges PDF-Dokument fremde Seiten eingefügt. Man kann Seiten auch umsortieren oder löschen.
Führt unterschiedliche PDF in eine Datei zusammen. Genau was ich wollte :-)
edita pdf, sencillo y my eficaz
Hace lo que promete y muy bien. El paquete snap está un poco desactualizado, pero funcina bien.
Muy bueno en lo suyo.
Sía así es, hace lo que dice hacer ed manera sencilla, rápida, intuitiva. Mejor que aplicaciones de pago o de prueba.
Interface simple et efficace, gain de temps important.
Super programme que j'utilisais énormément sous ubuntu mais malheureusement ne fonctionne pas sous kubuntu! :-(
Coool, tres simple
J'avoue que le logiciel est light et très facile. Le rendu nickel.
Manque juste l'option d'impression
Légère, performante et facile à prendre en main.
A mon avis, il manque la possibilité de compresser les documents
summary: Très simple d'utilisation et bien pratique

description: Très bien pour fusionner
Simple et fiable. On peut disposer les pages avec la souris.
Un excellent logiciel pour réorganiser les pages d'un document .pdf.

Avec l'ancienne version pdf-shuffler, je pouvais conserver mes liens hypertexte, ce n'est plus possible avec cette version pdf-arranger, je mets 4 etoiles parce-que c'est un programme qui m'a ete tres utile, mais maintenant ce n'est plus possible, et je n'en trouve pas d'autre qui fasse le meme travail.
comment puis-je réinstaller l'ancienne version, meme ça, ce n'est apparemment plus possible.
Installée en 2 min, documents pdf fusionnés en 1 mn. Waouh! Merci aux développeurs

Comme pour Nautilus, les anciennes versions étaient bien meilleures : pourquoi les programmeurs suppriment-ils des fonctions utiles ? Impossible de sélectionner toutes les pages puis d'en désélectionner certaines : ça casse toute la sélection !! Avant, pour conserver les pages 10, 20 et 30 sur 50, il suffisait de tout sélectionner (clic sur la première puis Shift-clic sur la dernière) puis de désélectionner les 3 pages (Ctrl-clic), et de supprimer la sélection soit 5 opérations. Maintenant, il faut sélectionner les pages 31 à 50, les supprimer, puis sélectionner les pages 21 à 29, les supprimer, puis sélectionner les pages 11 à 19, les supprimer, puis sélectionner les pages 1 à 9, les supprimer ! Dites, les programmeurs, vous utilisez vraiment votre version du logiciel ?
приложение заявленный функционал выполняет хорошо
подскажите аналог quite imposing
